EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Lean+Leaders_Backers_2016.Reminder - SF
EmailTemplate.subject: See You Tomorrow at the Leader’s Guide Workshop!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for signing up to attend the Leader’s Guide Workshop taking place tomorrow in San Francisco.
The Leader’s Guide To Adopting Lean Startup at Scale Friday, June 17th, 2016 Registration @ 9:30am Sessions Start @ 10:00am Lunch will be provided Workshop Agenda <[[http://pivotal.io/event/lean-workshops/backers/sanfrancisco]]>
Location Pivotal San Francisco <[[http://pivotal.io/locations/sanfrancisco]]> 875 Howard Street Fifth Floor San Francisco, CA 94103 Map & Directions <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/Pivotal/@37.7817915,-122.4060995,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m5!3m4!1s0x808580887d690df7:0x108e933f003c99e3!8m2!3d37.7817873!4d-122.4039108]]>
Questions? Contact us at leadersguide@pivotal.io <[[mailto:leadersguide@pivotal.io]]>
We look forward to seeing you there! The Pivotal Team
